column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been here several times and everything including their burgers
column3: to their pies and everything else is just incredible. I usually give more detailed reviews than this
column4: and if I didn't like it
column8: you won't get a bad meal here. You just won't. I've brought friends from Rome
column10: and my picky parents and everyone has had an excellent experience. Â
